Answers. Best Answer: PayPal refunds are very quick.. PayPal refunds can take 3-5 days.. PayPal refunds can take up to 10 business days. All of these statements are true. If you paid for the item with your outstanding PayPal balance, the refund should show up very quickly, as in a matter of hours. If you paid for the item via PayPal but used an attached credit or debit card, the refund will probably take 3-5 business days, since the CC needs to be notified of the refund.
